title: NORTHYARD Men's Athletic Running T-Shirts Quick Dry Workout Shirts Short-Sleeve Sports Gym Tee Tops Performance Activewear
description: Breathable Mesh fabric: Men's Running T-shirt are made of Quick drying and lightweight fabric that can efficiently absorb moisture and sweat, keeping you dry and comfortable all day long. (The material is soft and skin friendly, suitable for sports enthusiasts) Machine washable

UNIQUE: Crewneck design - Reflective logo print stripes paired with Two stylish reflective points at the left and right （Reflective stripes on the back hem of clothes）allow you to improve safety in low-light situations

Workmanship: Flat lock seams and no tag collar minimize friction and offer great comfort.Four-way stretch technology makes the fabric full of tension, more flexible and comfortable. Raglan sleeves provide full range of motion
UV Protection: The fabric rating UPF 50+ protects your skin from the harmful UVA/UVB rays, keeping you cool while outdoors in the direct sunlight

Applicable scenarios: The Men's Short Sleeve Athletic Shirt are perfect for running, fishing, sailing, swimming, beach, vacation, hiking, and various indoor and outdoor sports (suitable for all seasons)
